name: Dice & Monsters
description:
Download the windows version if you want to battle for the online leaderboards!

Dice & monsters is a strategy puzzle game. You must try and score the highest number by strategically placing dice. Think wisely when placing the dice as it can drastically change your score.

Left click to roll dice, left click to place a tile while hovering over the grid.

See you on the leaderboards!

Created for GMTK 2022 over 48 hours as a solo project.

Enjoy!
